titles.title: A resolution relating to the duties and privileges of Members of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 413 - 0 (Record Vote No: 128).

bill.summary: 5/12/1988--Introduced. Requests the Supreme Court to grant a writ of certiorari in the case of Wayne Chastain v. The Honorable Don Sundquist, relating to the official duties of a Member of the House of Representatives.
